chat.title: Suggestion
chat.message: This is a great module. Lets' use it in NHA.

chat.title: review
chat.message: Pharmacy will need to clarify different insulins available in NHA. The term "sliding scale" should be "basal/bolus". In most NHA sites, there will not be an endocrinologist to consult, or internist for that matter.

chat.title: gestational vs. pre gestational DM
chat.message: I would suggest we separate out gestational diabetes order set from Type1/2. The intrapartum and post partum management is very different, with different risk profiles.
